text: General Information : Cogency.io uses information for the following general purposes: products and services provision, billing, identification and authentication, services improvement, contact, research, and anonymous reporting.

Privacy

Editing and Deleting Account Information : Cogency.io uses 256-bit SSL-encryption to protect data transmissions.
Cogency.io may share demographic information with business partners, such as "53% of users who regularly use Cogency.io video service are between 18 and 24" or the like.

We will transfer information about you if Cogency.io is acquired by or merged with another company.
Cogency.io may be required to disclose personally identifiable information under special circumstances, such as to comply with subpoenas or when your actions violate the Cogency.io Terms of Service.
The reports disclose usage trends without identifying individual users.
